articles.content:
WPK delegation leaves for Greece
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Worker's Party of Korea (WPK) led by vice-department director Pak Kyong Son of the Central Committee of the WPK left here on Saturday to participate in an international meeting of communist and worker's parties which will be held in Athens.

articles.title: Vigorous anti-government struggle
Inaugural ceremony of 12th-term Sochongryon
articles.content:
Inaugural ceremony of 12th-term Sochongryon 
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- More than 400 students in Seoul, South Korea, held an inaugural ceremony of the 12th-term Seoul District Federation of General Student Councils (Sochongryon) at dong university on May 15, according to a radio report from Seoul.   
   They vowed to struggle to abolish the notorious "National Security Law" and defend the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) in defiance of suppression by the authorities.
   Ri Sang Hui, a 4th year student of Hongik University, was elected chairman of Sochongryon.
   And, Hanchongryon declared its will to hold an inaugural ceremony on May 28.

articles.title: Part 47 of film "the Nation and Destiny" released
Dangerous tie-up of war hawks at home and abroad
Continued struggle against "restructuring"
S. Korean university professors publish declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean university professors publish declaration
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Professor Kim Jin Gun of Seoul National University, professor Yu Cho Ha of Chungbuk National University and other university professors in South Korea held a press conference on May 14 and published a declaration on the situation to the effect that the "government" should change the mode of "restructuring" killing workers and other ordinary people and accelerate the reform of society as a whole, according to a radio report from Seoul.   
   The declaration was signed by more than 500 professors of 41 universities across South Korea.
   It said it is the present reality that the political camp is revealing its incompetence and idleness and inviting the people's resentment by defending only the interests of business groups without showing any sign of change.
   It strongly called for eliminating political-economic fusion and the bureaucratic system.

articles.title: Warmonger's inciting war fever against north
articles.content:
Warmonger's inciting war fever against north
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Chon Yong Thaek, "Minister of National Defence" of South Korea, who is notorious for anti-national acts, "inspected the first field army command of the puppet army and its "Alga" unit on the frontline on May 13, a Seoul-based radio reported.   
   He incited a fever of war against the north, making much ado about someone's "southward provocations" and calling for "building steadfast combat posture."
   His "inspection" and remarks, synchronizing with the U.S. Defense Secretary, William Cohen's utterances on May 11 that the United States is ready to hurl military force needed for contingencies on the Korean peninsula in the shortest time, are part of the anti-national criminal  moves to unleash a war against the north.
